meanings.definition: A synthetic compound used as a ganglionic blocker in medicine.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed hexamethoniums to help lower the patient's blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: The hospital stocked up on hexamethoniums for emergency situations.
meanings.sent3: The nurse accidentally spilled hexamethoniums all over the floor, creating a slippery mess.
meanings.sent4: The hexamethoniums acted like a shield, blocking the signals between nerves.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the hexamethoniums made them easy to spot in the medicine cabinet.
